field.name: summary
field.value: Cannot use types having their own base type as constructor argument

field.name: description
field.value:
Attached is a patch (on trunk) that demonstrates a problem with the MicroKernel. The problem is that you cannot use types having their own base type as constructor argument, even if you specify the constructor argument as a parameter. It fails with the message 'A cycle was detected when trying to resolve a dependency. The dependency graph that resulted in a cycle is: blabla'. Looks like the parameters are not checked before raising a cyclic dependency error.
This used to work, but looks to have ceased to do so in r2338 or 2162 (dependencies cycle checking).
